info.title: Lords Votes API
info.description: An API that allows querying of Lords Votes data.

get.summary: Return Divisions results grouped by party
get.description: Get a list of Divisions which contain grouped by party

parameters.name: SearchTerm
parameters.description: Divisions containing search term within title or number

parameters.name: MemberId
parameters.description: Divisions returning Member with Member ID voting records

parameters.name: IncludeWhenMemberWasTeller
parameters.description: Divisions where member was a teller as well as if they actually voted

parameters.name: StartDate
parameters.description: Divisions where division date in one or after date provided. Date format is yyyy-MM-dd

parameters.name: EndDate
parameters.description: Divisions where division date in one or before date provided. Date format is yyyy-MM-dd

parameters.name: DivisionNumber
parameters.description: Division Number - as specified by the House, unique within a session. This is different to the division id which uniquely identifies a division in this system and is passed to the GET division endpoint

parameters.name: TotalVotesCast.Comparator
parameters.description: comparison operator to use

parameters.name: TotalVotesCast.ValueToCompare
parameters.description: value to compare to with the operator provided

parameters.name: Majority.Comparator
parameters.description: comparison operator to use

parameters.name: Majority.ValueToCompare
parameters.description: value to compare to with the operator provided

200.description: List of divisions with votes grouped by party

get.summary: Return voting records for a Member
get.description: Get a list of voting records for a Member.

parameters.name: MemberId
parameters.description: Id number of a Member whose voting records are to be returned

parameters.name: SearchTerm
parameters.description: Divisions containing search term within title or number

parameters.name: IncludeWhenMemberWasTeller
parameters.description: Divisions where member was a teller as well as if they actually voted

parameters.name: StartDate
parameters.description: Divisions where division date in one or after date provided. Date format is yyyy-MM-dd

parameters.name: EndDate
parameters.description: Divisions where division date in one or before date provided. Date format is yyyy-MM-dd

parameters.name: DivisionNumber
parameters.description: Division Number - as specified by the House, unique within a session. This is different to the division id which uniquely identifies a division in this system and is passed to the GET division endpoint

parameters.name: TotalVotesCast.Comparator
parameters.description: comparison operator to use

parameters.name: TotalVotesCast.ValueToCompare
parameters.description: value to compare to with the operator provided

parameters.name: Majority.Comparator
parameters.description: comparison operator to use

parameters.name: Majority.ValueToCompare
parameters.description: value to compare to with the operator provided

parameters.name: skip
parameters.description: The number of records to skip. Must be a positive integer. Default is 0

parameters.name: take
parameters.description: The number of records to return per page. Must be more than 0. Default is 25

200.description: List of voting records for a member

503.description: Temporary error occured when trying to get division

get.description: Get a list of Divisions which meet the specified criteria.

parameters.name: SearchTerm
parameters.description: Divisions containing search term within title or number

parameters.name: MemberId
parameters.description: Divisions returning Member with Member ID voting records

parameters.name: IncludeWhenMemberWasTeller
parameters.description: Divisions where member was a teller as well as if they actually voted

parameters.name: StartDate
parameters.description: Divisions where division date in one or after date provided. Date format is yyyy-MM-dd

parameters.name: EndDate
parameters.description: Divisions where division date in one or before date provided. Date format is yyyy-MM-dd

parameters.name: DivisionNumber
parameters.description: Division Number - as specified by the House, unique within a session. This is different to the division id which uniquely identifies a division in this system and is passed to the GET division endpoint

parameters.name: TotalVotesCast.Comparator
parameters.description: comparison operator to use

parameters.name: TotalVotesCast.ValueToCompare
parameters.description: value to compare to with the operator provided

parameters.name: Majority.Comparator
parameters.description: comparison operator to use

parameters.name: Majority.ValueToCompare
parameters.description: value to compare to with the operator provided

parameters.name: skip
parameters.description: The number of records to skip. Must be a positive integer. Default is 0

parameters.name: take
parameters.description: The number of records to return per page. Must be more than 0. Default is 25

200.description: List of divisions matching specified parameters

503.description: Temporary error occured when trying to get division

get.description: Get total count of Divisions meeting the specified query, useful for paging lists etc...

parameters.name: SearchTerm
parameters.description: Divisions containing search term within title or number

parameters.name: MemberId
parameters.description: Divisions returning Member with Member ID voting records

parameters.name: IncludeWhenMemberWasTeller
parameters.description: Divisions where member was a teller as well as if they actually voted

parameters.name: StartDate
parameters.description: Divisions where division date in one or after date provided. Date format is yyyy-MM-dd

parameters.name: EndDate
parameters.description: Divisions where division date in one or before date provided. Date format is yyyy-MM-dd

parameters.name: DivisionNumber
parameters.description: Division Number - as specified by the House, unique within a session. This is different to the division id which uniquely identifies a division in this system and is passed to the GET division endpoint

parameters.name: TotalVotesCast.Comparator
parameters.description: comparison operator to use

parameters.name: TotalVotesCast.ValueToCompare
parameters.description: value to compare to with the operator provided

parameters.name: Majority.Comparator
parameters.description: comparison operator to use

parameters.name: Majority.ValueToCompare
parameters.description: value to compare to with the operator provided

200.description: Division with id matching given divisionId

get.description: Get a single Division which has the Id specified.

parameters.name: divisionId
parameters.description: Division with ID specified

200.description: Division with id matching given divisionId

404.description: Division with given divisionId was not found

503.description: Temporary error occured when trying to get division
